reviews.text: WTF?!?! The only good thing about this recipe is the fact that I have ticks on every single flavour! When it comes to making recipes just remember one thing my friend...LESS IS MORE. Happy mixing üëäüèª

there are wayyyy too many concentrates in this, %ge is too high, its like you just threw in every bakery flavour you had and then tried to figure out what it resembled?  Instead, everything just gets lost.  I saw it and thought, ok, I've seen crazier and it worked, this doesn't.  also, recipe notes are supposed to be posted in English so that the community as a whole can understand what you're thinking.

Iam sure you can make this profile with the half of that flavours. That are to much. Overcomplicated.
But however, i have mixed it, and  its a good glazed Donut Variation.
there are 23 concentrates is this not a muddled mess,, just curious never seen a recipe like this, is it good? thanks
